title: Was Lanny Wilson actually found guilty of wrongdoing in the Governer Easley Campaign finance situation.  Same question for Rusty Carter.
text:
Wilson has not been charged, althuough he is prominently mentioned in
the indictment of former Easley aide Ruffin Poole; More here:



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100121/ARTICLES/100129922



As for Carter, here's a link about his case:

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100504/ARTICLES/100509894
